title: Vamos Met De Familie Pos
overview: After their adventures in Helemaal Het Einde, we will follow the Family Pos once again to their well-deserved holiday in South America. A road trip through the continent of their new native country, Chile. However their idea of the upcoming holiday is completely different. Stephan prefers to do cool things together with their sons, while Ilona wants to sunbath at a pool and ] drink some cold drinks. So who's giving in?
